description:
Making your everyday banking easy and convenient is important to us. Desert Schools’ Mobile Banking app will allow you to do your banking anytime or anywhere. You’ll have the convenient features of Online Banking packaged into your own secure mobile bank. Check your balances while you’re shopping, transfer money on vacation, pay a bill waiting in your doctor’s office, or deposit a check from the comfort of your home – it’s all possible wherever you are, whenever you want with our Mobile Banking app. 

 • Check account balances
 • View transaction history
 • Transfer funds
 • Pay bills
 • Deposit checks
 • Manage alerts
 • Find ATM and branch location

Your security is one of our highest priorities at Desert Schools. We use state-of-the-art technologies to prevent unauthorized users from accessing your accounts. We will never transmit your account number and no secure data will ever be stored in your phone. To enhance security, you will log in to Mobile Banking each time you access your account. Never store your log in information within your mobile device. To learn more about our commitment to security, visit desertschools.org/security.

To take advantage of the features of Mobile Banking, log into Online Banking at desertschools.org and visit the Mobile Banking tab. Your Online Banking username and password will also be used to access Mobile Banking. For more information about Mobile Banking, visit desertschools.org/mobile.

By downloading this app, you accept our Mobile Banking Terms and Conditions, which can be viewed at desertschools.org/mobileterms. 

Desert Schools is federally insured by the NCUA.
releaseNotes:
DS MobileDeposit allows you to deposit your checks with your phone, saving you a trip to a branch or ATM. 

By downloading this app, you accept our Mobile Banking Terms and Conditions, which can be viewed at desertschools.org/mobileterms.
